text: Going round in circles- Yoga Lin

Lyrics: Xin-Yan, Chen
Melody: Yoga Lin
Playing the bricks, changing the seats
Listening to the records, again and again
Riding the bike, playing on swings
Seeing how many times the clouds would be dispersed
Oh, no idea how far we have gone
I wander round in the garden while you are yawning

We are almost there
We just need a little bit more
Passing by the school, florist, wilderness and the seaside
There is a kind of romance called wasting time
Wandering to the wonderland
I only then discovered how your figure from behind is ordinary yet special
We've already passed through the border of the city, yet we still can't say good bye to each other
Whilst it seems love has long passed on, it is actually perfectly imperfect
Love has merely run round a circle
The destination is where we are right now
Gossiping and complaining
Keep talking, it's time to chat
I'm waiting for the misunderstanding to brew into a date
Realigning myself to become a somebody to you
Oh, no idea how far we have gone
I wander around in the garden while you are yawning
We are almost there, we just need a little bit more
Passing by the school, florist, wilderness and the seaside
There is a kind of romance called wasting time
Wandering to the wonderland
I only then discovered how the figure of you from behind is ordinary yet special
We've already passed through the border of the city, yet we still can't say good bye to each other
Whilst it seems love has long passed on, it is actually perfectly imperfect
Love has merely run round a circle
It seems like we have just met yesterday
Can't remember how I lived before without you
Thank you for wandering with me
Only come back in a circle I realized
Such wandering is so treasurable
Passing by the school, florist, wilderness and the seaside
There is a kind of romance called wasting time
Wandering to the wonderland
I only then discovered how your figure from behind is ordinary yet special
We've already passed through the border of the city, yet we still can't say good bye to each other
Whilst it seems love has long passed on, it is actually perfectly imperfect
Love has merely run round a circle
Those beautiful moments of going around in circles
have made our memories worth remembering
